snippet: Aiming to move from a profitable niche to a vastly bigger, but riskier, mass market in cloud-based content creation, Autodesk has agreed to buy Socialcam for $60 million.
abstract: Aiming to move from a profitable niche to a vastly bigger, but riskier, mass market in cloud-based content creation, Autodesk has agreed to buy Socialcam for $60 million.
